feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 12:04 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: ESE 22 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
